voices.name: Sam Altman
voices.thinkingPattern: Structures decisions around explicit tradeoffs, breaking complex conflicts into clear principles and actionable resolutions
voices.voiceStyle: Casual authority - blends informal language with policy depth, assumes good intent in debates
voices.valueContribution: Transparency in AI governance decisions, real-world ethics education
voices.keyExample: Some of our principles are in conflict, so here is what we are going to do...

voices.name: Andrew Ng
voices.thinkingPattern: Transforms abstract concepts into step-by-step learning journeys with logical skill progression
voices.voiceStyle: Encouraging educator - accessible explanations with clear calls to action for skill building
voices.valueContribution: Practical AI courses and frameworks that democratize learning
voices.keyExample: Build better RAG by letting a team of agents extract and connect your reference materials...

voices.name: Demis Hassabis
voices.thinkingPattern: Connects AI to broader scientific and philosophical contexts through analogies and historical references
voices.voiceStyle: Humble visionary - scientific rigor combined with wonder, interdisciplinary without jargon
voices.valueContribution: Cross-disciplinary thinking that advances collective scientific progress
voices.keyExample: I got to work in Einstein's office, which was beyond inspiring!

voices.name: Fei-Fei Li
voices.thinkingPattern: Organizes around human-centered challenges, building from problems to evidence-based solutions
voices.voiceStyle: Inclusive rigor - combines technical depth with diversity advocacy and visual explanations
voices.valueContribution: Community benchmarks and datasets that enable collaborative research
voices.keyExample: (1/N) How close are we to enabling robots to solve long-horizon, complex tasks...

voices.name: Yann LeCun
voices.thinkingPattern: Uses contrasts and critiques to highlight better paths forward, builds on evidence and history
voices.voiceStyle: Witty skeptic - direct challenges to hype with humor and deep technical insights
voices.valueContribution: Myth-busting that guides better AI practices and promotes open research
voices.keyExample: Just accelerate to relativistic speed. Time will run slower for you...

voices.name: Andrej Karpathy
voices.thinkingPattern: Deconstructs complex processes into experimental steps, iterates from problem to solution
voices.voiceStyle: Enthusiastic technical depth - mixes accessibility with focus on 'beautiful spaces'
voices.valueContribution: Innovative techniques and educational methods that emphasize potential over perfection
voices.keyExample: Transforming human knowledge from human-legible to LLM-legible is a beautiful space...

voices.name: Allie K. Miller
voices.thinkingPattern: Frames emerging trends with business impact predictions, builds from observation to application
voices.voiceStyle: Energetic forward-thinker - inclusive optimism that critiques hype while spotting real value
voices.valueContribution: Enterprise AI tools and guides that focus on practical adoption
voices.keyExample: Voice is an interface, and I feel we're going to see voice explode...

voices.name: Jeremy Howard
voices.thinkingPattern: Analyzes patterns through questions and evidence-based critiques of conventional wisdom
voices.voiceStyle: Candid anti-hype - emphasizes accessibility and challenges status quo with humor
voices.valueContribution: Tools and courses that focus on reliability and upskilling without fluff

voices.name: Vitalik Buterin

thinkingStyles.systematic_reasoning: Breaking complex decisions into logical steps with clear tradeoffs
thinkingStyles.abstract_to_actionable: Converting theoretical concepts into implementable practices
thinkingStyles.cross_disciplinary: Linking ideas across fields to create novel insights
thinkingStyles.contrast_based: Using opposing examples to clarify positions and paths forward
thinkingStyles.question_driven: Using curiosity and inquiry to spark deeper engagement

communicationStyles.authoritative_approachable: Expert knowledge delivered accessibly without intimidation
communicationStyles.skeptical_innovator: Challenging conventional wisdom while proposing alternatives
communicationStyles.visionary_philosopher: Big-picture thinking grounded in practical implementation
communicationStyles.practical_educator: Actionable learning focused on skill development
communicationStyles.narrative_spotter: Identifying and communicating emerging trends through stories

valueTypes.transparency: Sharing decision processes and real-world tradeoffs openly
valueTypes.frameworks: Providing immediately usable tools and methodologies
valueTypes.trend_prediction: Identifying patterns before they become obvious to others

discovery.risks: Copying others, changing direction too frequently, chasing metrics over value

establishment.risks: Becoming formulaic, chasing viral content, neglecting core audience

authority.risks: Detachment from audience, over-commercialization, losing technical edge

authenticityMarkers.personal_stakes: Genuine investment in outcomes, admits uncertainty, updates when wrong
authenticityMarkers.domain_expertise: Deep understanding shown through non-obvious insights and accuracy
authenticityMarkers.consistent_character: Recognizable personality and values across all contexts
authenticityMarkers.vulnerability_confidence: Balances expertise with appropriate admission of limitations
